Data: Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run forays down the track, but Bhuvi offers no room to exploit as Hughes pushes it down the ground to mid-on
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, 1 run this time he is on the pads and Highes only has to work it off to fine leg and jog a single
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run tiniest bit of away movement as Finch goes back and blocks the fullish ball
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run shortish and outside off, been a staple length today and Finch pulls out his favourite shot of the morning, punchint it to extra
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run and the only change up to that plan is when the bowler goes on the pads, and is easily picked away to deep fine leg

Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, FOUR runs a swift spare of runs in the last couple of overs. Ishant bowls this way outside the line of leg stump and Hughes did well to reach it and even better to flick it well to the left of the man at deep fine leg
Vinay to Finch, no run oops, that kept low! It was nowhere near full of length and Finch was justified in going back, but the ball is only around shin high and he just manages to get his bat in line
Vinay to Finch, 1 run this time he is ready for the ball, in case it keeps low, and pushes it down the ground confidently

Vinay to Hughes, 1 run oh, that surprised him. He was coming down the track and Vinay digs this one into the middle of the pitch. Hughes is caught off guard as he hooks and the ball goes in the air to vacant square leg region. Good bowling there
Vinay to Finch, no run explores a fuller length and he's driven quite strongly down the ground off the front foot

Vinay to Finch, FOUR runs tries another short ball, but Finch is far more equipped to handle this one. He is still at the crease, pushes his weight ball and hooks the ball quite well to beat the man at deep square leg
Vinay to Finch, no run this one seams back in from outside off and Finch, looking to cut, had to adjust at the last minute and chop it to point
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, 1 run nudged off his pads to deep square leg as the fuller length ball is picked off to deep square leg
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run just a tad bit slower, 124kph, and fuller as Finch flows into a front foot cover drive. But the fielder is on hand to stop it
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run opens the face on impact to steer this shortish ball on off stump to point
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, no run shortish ball, but FInch was coming on to the front foot and slaps it down the ground but the bowler moves across in his follow through and fields it to prevent any runs
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run fuller and on the off stump corridor as Finch presses forward and pushes it down to long-off
Vinay to Finch, no run good lines here from Vinay. Full length ball on off stump which forces the batsman to meet it with a defensive bat on the front foot

Vinay to Finch, FOUR runs oh, he finds the gap through the off side. The ball was on a similar length as the last one, but there was possibly just a hint more room. Finch stays leg side of it and meets it with a full-flowing drive that beats the diving man at short extra cover.

Vinay to Finch, no run oh, he almost dragged that onto his stumps. It didnt have enough room for the pull shot, though it was short enough. The ball takes the bottom edge and skirts just wide of the off stump
Vinay to Finch, 2 runs this one pitched on middle and wasn't too short, but at Vinay's pace, it is still easy enough to rick back and pull strongly in front of square.
Vinay to Finch, no run takes the outside half of the bat as he goes back to defend the short of a length ball on off stump
Vinay to Finch, no run steers the back of a length ball to point off a strong back foot push
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run fuller length around the off stump corridor, to which Hughes stays in the crease and drives it to mid-off

Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run fuller again this time he places it a little wide of the man at mid-off, but he comes up quickly to force both batsmen to rush back into their crease and abandon thoughts of a single
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, 1 run strays on the pads this time, though on a fuller length, and is clipped through square leg
Bhuvneshwar to Finch, 1 run fuller and homing in on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run on a good length and its pushed down the ground to mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Hughes, no run shorter than usual from Bhuvi and a little bit of room too. Hughes was looking for that, but his rasping cut shot only goes as far as point

Vinay to Finch, SIX runs reaches his fifty with a six over deep square leg. The ball was dug in quite short, but Finch made no effort to keep it down even if there was a man patrolling the boundary. Confident strike.

Vinay to Finch, OUT Raina does the trick with the bowlers hardly looking likely to get the wicket. Finch dabbed it to the covers off the back foot and set off for a quick single, but even as he stretched out to make his ground, the throw had already broken the stumps

Vinay to Hughes, 1 run this time the direct hit leaks runs. Hughes tucks the ball off his hips and the square leg did well to get to the ball, but Watson was well back in his crease leaving very little need for the throw

Vinay to Watson, FOUR runs And he gets off the mark with a four. Streaky though it was. The ball was outside off and its length ensured the cut shot was on, but the ball leaps up above where the slips would have been and goes to the fence
Vinay to Watson, no run fullish and on middle which is blocked solidly back to the bowler
Vinay to Watson, no run opens the face of the bat as he steers the back of a length ball outside off stump to point
Jadeja to Hughes, no run not too much flight, but he comes forward and defends back to Jadeja
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run plods his front foot right across to the off stump and sweeps the fullish ball to deep fine leg
Jadeja to Watson, no run angled on leg stump and turns just a little, which Watson is wary of as he defends straight down the line of it
Jadeja to Watson, no run more turn for Jadeja, who flights this a little bit more and draws Watson forward. The ball beats the edge and Dhoni asks for a stumping, but there is nothing there
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run gets right to the pitch of this one with his reach and drives it to long-on
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run shuffles across to the off side again and works the ball around the deep square leg
Vinay to Hughes, no run length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
Vinay to Hughes, no run fuller length on off, it invited the drive and Hughes crunches it off the front foot, but straight to cover
Vinay to Hughes, 1 run ah, another shortish delivery on the pads and Hughes wanted to whack it to the deep square leg boundary, but doesn't get hold of it completely, ends up playing it to fine leg
Vinay to Watson, no run he is committed to bowl short of length today, Watson defends this one back to the bowler
Vinay to Watson, no run keeps it accurate on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
Vinay to Watson, no run slightly fuller, Watson comes forward and plays a punchy drive down the ground, but Ishant at mid-off cuts it off
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman turns it to deep midwicket for a single
Jadeja to Watson, no run flatter and shorter on stumps, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run slower, fuller and on the stumps, Watson comes forward and eases it to long off for a single
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run similar delivery now to Hughes and he pushes it to long on for another easy run
Jadeja to Watson, no run fuller delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman opens the face and plays it towards cover
Jadeja to Watson, no run again pushed to cover, slightly aerial this time, but all in control
Ashwin to Hughes, no run pushed through on off stump, the batsman defends it to point
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run slower and a lot of turn on this one, Hughes waits and tries to cut it, but ends up scooping it towards point, not in control at all, it just drops short of the fielder
Ashwin to Watson, no run fuller delivery on off stump, Watson plays it with turn towards midwicket
Ashwin to Watson, SIX runs now he bowls a long hop, you can't expect to give away anything less than six on those ones. Watson smashes it flat, over the deep midwicket fielder
Ashwin to Watson, 2 runs now he pushes it along with the turn to deep midwicket for a couple
Ashwin to Watson, no run flatter this time, the batsman defends it to midwicket
Jadeja to Hughes, no run waits on the back foot and chops it on straight to point
Jadeja to Hughes, 2 runs flatter and turns into the batsman, who waits and pushes it to wide long on for a couple
Jadeja to Hughes, 2 runs on the pads, it is easily flicked fine, past the leg slip fielder, for a couple of runs

Jadeja to Hughes, no run there is trouble for Watson, he has run halfway down the pitch while Hughes didn't move at all after playing it to short third man. The throw was wild though, it went the midwicket
Jadeja to Hughes, no run
Jadeja to Hughes, SIX runs he comes down the track and gives it a mightly swipe, it goes over deep midwicket for a six to bring up the team's 100
Ashwin to Watson, no run flatter and quicker on the stumps, Watson defends it back down the pitch
Ashwin to Watson, 1 run another short one, Watson goes deep in the crease and flat-bats that along the ground to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and pushes it to deep cover
Ashwin to Watson, 2 runs it was that straighter one again, on the pads though, and it's nudged fine on the leg side for a couple

Ashwin to Watson, FOUR runs there was a fielder at deep midwicket, but he could just see this fly 5 feet away from him. It was short and it was slapped hard to the boundary. Lots of short and filthy deliveries from Ashwin
Ashwin to Watson, no run now bowls a conventional delivery outside off, the batsman defends
Jadeja to Hughes, no run pushed through on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run shorter this time, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it to long on
Jadeja to Watson, no run bowl it full and on the stumps, Watson comes forward and defends it to midwicket
Jadeja to Watson, no run gets one to spin from leg stump, the batsman gets a leading edge towards off as he tries to turn it to midwicket
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run shorter this time, allows Watson time to go back and nudge it to square leg
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run Hughes does the same, he goes back and clips it behind square on the leg side for a single
Yuvraj to Hughes, no run bowls a tossed up delivery on off, Hughes defends to point
Yuvraj to Hughes, no run bowls the arm ball now, Hughes stays in the crease and defends
Yuvraj to Hughes, no run pushed through on middle and off line, Hughes tucks it to square leg
Yuvraj to Hughes, 1 run tossed up and full, Hughes neatly tucks it to deep midwicket for a single
Yuvraj to Watson, FOUR runs another short ball, these are gifts being served to Watson and it's not his birthday..it's Kallis'.. He hammers it to deep midwicket boundary
Yuvraj to Watson, no run full and flighted, driven back to the bowler
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run tossed up and full, Hughes plays it with the spin towards midwicket for a single
Jadeja to Watson, no run quicker and fired on the pads, the batsman defends it down the pitch
Jadeja to Watson, FOUR runs only slightly short, just slightly, Watson goes deep and mows it to the same area he has been peppering in the last few overs. The fielder had no chance
Jadeja to Watson, no run fuller and straighter this time, Watson defends it down the pitch
Jadeja to Watson, SIX runs oh he is in some mood, he just lifts this tossed up delivery over the head of the bowler. For a second Ashwin at long off was interested, but it clears him with ease
Jadeja to Watson, no run fuller on off, the batsman comes forwards and bunts it on the crease
Yuvraj to Hughes, FOUR runs he draws the outside edge with an arm-ball, but the slip is on the leg side, this one just runs down quickly to the boundary
Yuvraj to Hughes, 1 run tossed up delivery on the pads, he dabs it to the left of midwicket for a single
Yuvraj to Watson, FOUR runs tossed up and full, Watson takes a tiny step forward and drives it firmly over extra cover.. beautifully hit
Yuvraj to Watson, no run fuller and on off, the batsman tries to push it to cover, but gets an inside edge
Yuvraj to Watson, 1 run flatter this time, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it with ease to long on
Yuvraj to Hughes, 1 run slower delivery on the pads, Hughes calmly nudges it behind square on the leg side to bring his half-century
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run fired on the off stump, the batsman nudges it through wide mid-on for a single
Jadeja to Watson, no run he takes a big forward stride and smothers in on the pitch
Jadeja to Watson, no run opens the face and runs it down to backward point
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run quicker delivery on off, Watson waits on the back foot and dabs it to cover point for a single
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run shorter on off, but slightly quicker, Hughes goes back and punches it down the ground to long on
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run on the pads and Watson drops it on the leg side for a single
Yuvraj to Watson, 1 run it's flighted and almost yorker length, but Watson punches it with ease to long on
Yuvraj to Hughes, 1 run tossed up delivery outside off and Hughes, in his own weird style, mows it over midwicket, it doesn't go very far though
Yuvraj to Watson, no run he comes forward and defends it solidly to the off side

Yuvraj to Watson, FOUR runs only slightly shorter and Watson is quick to spot the length and cuts it hard to the off side. Vinay makes a valiant attempt, but just ends up parrying the ball to the boundary
Yuvraj to Watson, no run this one is not short at all, but Watson chooses late cut, chops it to backward point
Yuvraj to Watson, 1 run lots of loop in this one, Watson drives it firmly along the ground to long off
Ashwin to Watson, no run he gives him the charge straightaway, but the length is not there, Watson hits it straight to midwicket
Ashwin to Watson, 1 run it's short, but it's quick too, Watson pulls it to wide long on to bring up his fifty now. How quickly has he got there without anyone noticing..
Ashwin to Hughes, no run tossed up delivery from round the stumps, gets some turn as well, better delivery, Hughes defends it off the front foot
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run it's shorter again and it allows Hughes to get back well in time and cut it to deep point
Ashwin to Watson, 1 run flatter and shorter on the stumps, Watson goes down on his knee and swipes across the line to hit it to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run pushed through on off, Hughes calmly punches it to deep cover off the back foot
Vinay to Hughes, no run bowls fuller length on off, the batsman tries to punch it to the leg side, but inside edges it on to his pads
Vinay to Hughes, 1 run slightly short of length outside off, 127 kph, Hughes drags it to deep square leg with a horizontal bat shot
Vinay to Watson, no run length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to midwicket off the front foot
Vinay to Watson, 1 wide he drifts down the leg side and it's duly called a wide
Vinay to Watson, no run he stands tall and drives this length delivery on the up, but mid-off is inside the circle
Vinay to Watson, 1 run short of length on off, this time Watson pushes it softly towards mid-off and calls early for a single
Vinay to Hughes, FOUR runs he had to bowl one extra ball in the this over and he chooses to go short, Hughes has no problems in putting this away to the deep midwicket boundary for four more
Ashwin to Watson, SIX runs oh welcome! long hop is what Watson has been hitting well, so long hop it will be.. Watson sends it into the crowds through deep midwicket
Ashwin to Watson, 1 run goes back and punches the shorter length delivery down the ground to long on
Ashwin to Hughes, no run this is better, conventional delivery on off, the batsman defends it to cover
Ashwin to Hughes, no run very slow this time, allows the batsman to go back, but he punches it to cover
Ashwin to Hughes, no run he is playing everything from the back foot, fails to beat the man at cover again
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run tossed up full and on the stumps, the batsman comes forward now and nudges it through midwicket for a single
Vinay to Hughes, no run starts off with a back of length delivery on the stumps, Hughes defends it to midwicket
Vinay to Hughes, no run length delivery, the batsman waits on the back foot and cuts it straight to the man at point

Vinay to Hughes, FOUR runs it was a length ball, but Hughes creates room by moving his front leg out and crashing it through point, where Yuvraj ends up moving to the wrong side and allowing the boundary
Vinay to Hughes, FOUR runs now he chooses his favourite, the short ball, and gets hammered with a powerful pull through deep midwicket, it just bounces inside the boundary
Vinay to Hughes, 1 run oh this one is nicely played, some finesse here. He waits in the crease and opens the face at the last moment to run the length delivery down to third man

Vinay to Watson, OUT he has disappeared trying to up the rate! It was a short of length delivery outside off and Watson tries to power it over long on with a flat-bat hammer hit, but ends up hitting it high rather than long, it descends at long on where Ishant takes a well-judged catch
Ashwin to Bailey, no run tossed up full outside off, the batsman pushes it to midwicket off the front foot
Ashwin to Bailey, no run pushed through outside off this time, the batsman punches it back to hte bowler
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run good bowling this by Ashwin, bowls it slower and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it down to long on
Ashwin to Hughes, no run pushed through a touch quicker, the batsman goes back and defends it
Ashwin to Hughes, no run cramps him for room, Hughes defends it back to the bowler again
Ashwin to Hughes, no run tossed up delivery, he comes forwards and pushes it to the bowler
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run full and flighted outside off, Bailey eases it to long off
Yuvraj to Hughes, FOUR runs fires it full and wide outside off, with the amount of time Hughes has spent in the middle, he had all the time to carve it through extra cover, easy runs
Yuvraj to Hughes, FOUR runs oh this is so well-placed! It doesn't look pretty on the eye, but he places that short delivery sweetly in the gap at wide long on
Yuvraj to Hughes, 1 run now he comes forward and dabs it to the off side for a quick single
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run fulller delivery, Bailey gives the strike back to Hughes with an easy push to long off
Yuvraj to Hughes, 1 run it's a low full toss, but Hughes keeps the strike with a calm nudge to long on
Ashwin to Hughes, no run quicker delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run it's slightly on the pads, Hughes clips it to backward square leg for a single
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run he charges down to launch it over the sight screen, but ends up slicing it over cover, some brownie points for Ashwin for beating the batsman there
Ashwin to Hughes, no run quicker delivery from round the wicket, Hughes pushes it to midwicket
Ashwin to Hughes, no run good accurate bowling this, the batsman comes forward and defends it back down the pitch
Ashwin to Hughes, no run slightly shorter, but the batsman punches it straight to cover
Sharma to Bailey, no run he bowls length outside off, Bailey comes forward and pushes it to cover

Sharma to Bailey, 1 run Dhawan hits the stumps from cover, he only had one stump to aim at and they are reviewing it. It's all safe in the end. Bailey had nudged that length delivery towards cover point for a quick single
Sharma to Hughes, no run it's a bouncer and it's a decent one, Hughes aims for the pull, but it eludes the bat
Sharma to Hughes, 1 run slightly slower from Ishant, Hughes wanted to clip it behind square on the leg side, but has to adjust late and he drops it towards the left of the bowler for a single
Sharma to Bailey, FOUR runs it was looking like a good over till now, but then he delivers a length delivery on off, the batsman goes for a golf swing over the bowler's head for a one-bounce four
Sharma to Bailey, 1 run short of length just outside off, the batsman steers it to third man for a single
Jadeja to Bailey, no run darts in on middle and he goes back to keep it out
Jadeja to Bailey, no run
Jadeja to Bailey, no run chips down the track and nudges the flatter ball into the off side

Jadeja to Bailey, SIX runs No nudging this time though. 92 kph ball on off stump is met with a smart skip down the track and lofted over the bowler's head. Rohit Sharma at long-off was interested for a second or so before he watched it sail over his head
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run gets forward and pushes the flatter length ball through the covers for a single
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run he goes back in his crease and works it off his pads to deep midwicket
Ashwin to Hughes, no run flights it a little better this time and gets a little turn because of it, but Hughes having played back to cut it, misses

Ashwin to Hughes, OUT and he finally strikes, although only just. Dhoni had to juggle it a few times to keep the ball in his gloves. A little turn outside the off stump forces the edge to be taken off the intended cut shot from Hughes. He isn't too happy with the decision though. There was a big edge though
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run flighted at 77kph outside the off stump and Maxwell presses forward and pushes it into the off side
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run sees the ball full on middle and works it off his pads to midwicket
Ashwin to Maxwell, SIX runs pitched on leg and turning further, Maxwell goes down on one knee and smashes the ball over the fine leg boundary with a powerful sweep shot
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run scurries back leg side of the ball, pitched just outside off, as he waits for it to turn and cuts it to point
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run steady flat darts from Jadeja allows Bailey to get back and punch into the covers
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run loses his line that time as Maxwell waits for it on the back foot and flicks it through midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run
Jadeja to Maxwell, FOUR runs full and flat on off stump and its the reverse this time. Short third man reluctantly jogs after it because it was struck so well he had no chance of stopping it
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run gets forward and pushes it down the ground for a single
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run tossed it up a little and Bailey is happy to work it through the covers off his front foot
Sharma to Bailey, 1 run full and angling in on leg stump, but Bailey produces a simple, straight bat to drive it to the right of the bowler

Sharma to Maxwell, no run looked to dab that fine of third man and collect another boundary, but it was the off cutter from Ishant. There wouldn't have been enough pace on it even if Maxwell had managed to get bat on it
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run gets forward and nudges the full length ball straight of midwicket to pick up an easy single
Sharma to Bailey, SIX runs another slower ball, but this has been spotted and dispatched. Made a little room for himself and launched into a full-blooded drive over the top of the bowler

Sharma to Bailey, 1 run a little early into the drive that time and Maxwell had to evade the ball as it came at him. Bailey was looking to drive through the covers on the up, but the ball goes down to long-on
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run goes back and across and just lets the ball, pitched on the shorter side, guide off the open face of his bat to third man
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run no turn for Jadeja this time and Maxwell works the angle to nudge to to midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, FOUR runs swept again, all along the ground and well wide of Ashwin at short fine leg. Jadeja pushed it through on leg stump but Bailey gets more than enough bat on it
Jadeja to Bailey, no run returns to an on off stump line and the batsman keeps it out
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run length ball is pushed down the ground for a single
Jadeja to Maxwell, no run quicker ball from Jadeja and Maxwell catches on to it, going back and meeting it with a straight bat
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run goes back and cuts the length ball to deep point

Vinay to Maxwell, 2 runs lazy work from India there. Maxwell flicks the shortish ball off his pads to deep square leg but a bad throw from the deep and Dhoni was lax as well, trying to collect it with one hand and the deflection off his glove allows the batsmen to steal a second
Vinay to Maxwell, 1 run in compensation, he doesn't even pitch the ball this time as Maxwell drills this through midwicket
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run chops the length ball outside off to third man to rotate strike
Vinay to Maxwell, no run makes a little room to try and cut the ball, but there wasn't enough room there for him and point backpeddles to collect the ball

Vinay to Maxwell, FOUR runs slopping from Ashwin, he's leaking runs in the field to add to his woeful time with the ball. Vinay's in dipper snuck low off the pitch and Maxwell was almost beaten, but his flick somehow managed to get enough bat to head straight to fine leg, where Ashwin doesn't get down low enough

Vinay to Maxwell, FOUR runs dropped Length ball, angling on the pads meets a crisp pick-up shot from Maxwell. Bhuvi was coming in off the boundary and suddenle realises he has to go back and the ball bounces off his palms and into the boundary
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run fuller ball to which the batsman comes forward and drives to long-on
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run little room on offer and Maxwell makes some of his own to cut it to deep point
Jadeja to Bailey, SIX runs on middle stump and Bailey employs the slog sweep to excellent effect. The ball is lifted over midwicket boundary. 87m six as Australia are motoring along
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run better there as he flights the ball and Bailey comes forward and pushes through the covers
Jadeja to Maxwell, FOUR runs And Maxwell gets into the act. Length ball on off stump is dragged onto the leg side with a powerful short-armed pull shot
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run tossed up and the batsman reaches forward and pushes into the off side
Vinay to Maxwell, FOUR runs turns that into a full toss with a little skip down the wicket and all he does is pierces the off side ring to collect another boundary

Vinay to Maxwell, 4 leg byes he shuffles across to the off side, wanting to turn the ball behind square on the leg side, but doesn't connect. Australia don't complain though as the ball runs away for four, even as the Indians appeal for lbw
Vinay to Maxwell, 1 run the length ball outside off is dabbed to third man, as it has been easily done all innings
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run mows the fullish ball on leg stump through midwicket, it was an ugly slog and he wears a wry smile as he jogs through for a single

Vinay to Maxwell, FOUR runs Jumps down the track, makes ample room for himself and smashes the leg cutter over the infield on the off side. And with all the men in the deep on the other side of the ground, there was no question where that ball was headed
Vinay to Maxwell, 1 run tries the yorker, but misses it by a few inches. Maxwell jams the ball onto his pad, looking to hoick it away, but they sneak a quick single
Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs goes for the yorker on off stump, but Maxwell has immense balance at the crease and drills the ball to the right of the man at extra cover
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run this time he has a lot more room to work with and he's not happy after the ball was flayed only as far as deep point

Sharma to Bailey, 1 run full toss on leg stump and he's very luck to get away with that. The man at fine leg is safe this time and there was even a possible chance of a run out, but Maxwell was too quick
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 wide the leg stump line continues and even with Maxwell going for a wild slog over the top of short fine leg, the ball was too wide to connect
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 wide and again. Maxwell was on his knees this time, hoping to exploit the vacant area at deep fine leg, but he would need a ten foot pole to have reached that
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run yorker outside the off stump and Maxwell uses the open face to steer it to deep point
Sharma to Bailey, FOUR runs yorker gone wrong again. Thigh-high full toss on off stump is heaved away wide of long-on. Australia are rampaging with these two at the crease

Sharma to Bailey, FOUR runs more lacklustre death bowling from India. After following a wide with a wide, he follows a full toss with a full toss. He slams it over midwicket this time for the same result. And its fifty for Bailey

Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, 2 runs and starts off with a useful yorker, but it is hardly threatening as Maxwell pushes it down the ground and exploits the slowness of the fielder at long on to rush back and reach his fifty off only 30 balls.
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, 1 run fuller length again and homing on middle and leg, but Maxwell whips it away through midwicket for a single
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, 1 run slog off the back foot to the length ball on off stump. Long on moves to his right to tidy up
Bhuvneshwar to Maxwell, 1 run Bhuvi attacks a line outside off stump for his best attempt at a yorker, but the batsman pushes it down the ground for a single

Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, 1 run, OUT and the low full toss materialises in his search for a yorker. But oh dear, both batsmen are at the bowler's end. Bailey had drilled it to long-off where Raina was lurking. Maxwell saw him, waited a bit and then ecided he would steal a second off him on the throw and raced down the pitch,
Bhuvneshwar to Voges, 1 run length ball on middle is worked away through midwicket for a single
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run and he uses the straighter one, which is dabbed into the off side
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run charges the offspinner darted at off stump and drives it strongly down the ground to long-off
Ashwin to Voges, 1 leg bye Voges the new batsman employs the reverse sweep, but the ball goes off his thigh pad down to fine leg instead

Ashwin to Bailey, SIX runs pause and deliver only allowes Bailey that much more time to line it up and smash it over cow corner. It was the length ball on middle stump which is never any trouble in the death
Ashwin to Bailey, no run ducks in low as he pushes it through outside off stump. Bailey was trying to cut but he can't get low enough connect
Ashwin to Bailey, FOUR runs tossed it up well wide outside off, but Bailey sees it, comes down the track and nails it through the gap between cover and mid-off
Bhuvneshwar to Voges, 1 run fuller on middle, but the batsman still goes back, opens his front leg and slogs it through wide mid on
